feed.title: AO3 works tagged 'Ever Given Container Ship (Anthropomorphic)'

entry.title: Evergiving
entry.summary:
by Anonymous

"She’s not paying much attention to the ship that passes on her waters, no different from the hundreds that went before – at least until it takes an abrupt, hard turn to the right and collides at top speed with the wall. "

It turns out five days and an international crisis is all it takes to fall in love.

Words: 3459, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Maritime Shipping (Anthropomorphic), Maritime RPF, ever given fandom, Object and Concept Anthropomorphism
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Ever Given Container Ship (Anthropomorphic), Suez Canal (Anthropomorphic)
  • Relationships: Ever Given Container Ship/Suez Canal (Anthropomorphic)
  • Additional Tags: this one is for li en you stupid bitch, thanks for making me write this, me x li en is the real ship, when i turn up at the gates to heaven god is gonna make me answer for this, i would say i'm sorry but am i, i put a somewhat concerning amount of time into this crack fic, happy anniversary to these two and their love story, there's also a cat - Freeform, i'm aware the evergiven did not have a cat, but it should, i honestly don't know why you would come to this expecting accuracy, but if you are, don't, this is complete crack

entry.title: From Bow to Stern
entry.summary:
by makelotsofpots

All waterways are bastards. That's what Ever Forward realizes in the wake of her sister Ever Given's scandal and subsequent imprisonment. Yet even though she should know better, every time she passes through Chesapeake Bay's waters, she wishes she could stay a little longer...
